installments-conditions.title: Review and Confirm Installments
installments-conditions.programName: Program Name: UX/UI Design Diploma with Installment Payments
installments-conditions.termsIntro: By paying the first installment for Acadima programs, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms:
terms.body: By completing the payment for any installment, the user is considered to have agreed to all the listed terms and conditions.

terms.title: 2. Payment Schedule:
terms.body: The user must adhere to paying all agreed-upon installments on the specified dates according to the schedule.

terms.title: 3. Late Payment:
terms.body: In case of payment delay, acadima reserves the right to take appropriate measures to ensure completion of payments, including freezing the program or restricting access to learning materials.

terms.title: 4. Refund Policy:
terms.body: No payment can be refunded except in special circumstances evaluated by the acadima administration.

terms.title: 5. Program Access:
terms.body: Access to the educational program is granted upon successful completion of the first installment.

terms.title: 6. Reminder Notification:
terms.body: Notifications will be sent prior to each due date to avoid any delay or service interruption.

terms.title: 7. Communication & Support:
terms.body: Subscribers can contact the acadima support team for inquiries regarding payments or terms.

installments-conditions.importantNote: Important: By proceeding with the payment, you fully and irrevocably agree to all the terms and conditions, and you commit to complying with them to ensure continued access to Acadima services.
